scripts.start: concurrently "npm run pg" "npm run server-pg" "npm run client"
scripts.pg-export: cd postgresdb && node -r dotenv/config export.js dotenv_config_path="../.env"
scripts.pg-clear: npm run pg-export && cd postgresdb && docker-compose down && docker volume rm postgresdb_pgdata
scripts.mongo-export: cd mongodb && node -r dotenv/config export.js dotenv_config_path="../.env"
scripts.mongo-clear: npm run mongo-export && cd mongodb && docker-compose down && docker volume rm mongodb_mongodb_data && docker rm mongodb_mongodb_init
